body.para: The cutting fluid temperature controller controls the temperature of the cutting fluid in the coolant tank to prevent the fluid temperature from rising due to residual heat emitted by chips and heat generated by the coolant pump.

The cutting fluid temperature controller compares the temperatures detected by a temperature sensor (thermistor) mounted on the bed and in the cutting fluid temperature controller and activates a heater or cooler to adjust the temperature of the cutting fluid until it matches that of the bed.
